mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,a.yonghu_xuehao as yonghuXuehao ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,a.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,a.yonghu_zhuzhi as yonghuZhuzhi ,a.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,a.yonghu_role as yonghuRole ,a.yonghu_zhanye as yonghuZhanye ,a.yonghu_banji as yonghuBanji ,a.jieyueshuliang as jieyueshuliang ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yonghu a
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and a.yonghu_xuehao like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuXuehao},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and a.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and a.yonghu_zhuzhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuZhuzhi},'%')
and a.yonghu_role like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuRole},'%')
and a.yonghu_zhanye like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuZhanye},'%')
and a.yonghu_banji like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuBanji},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
